original_text: The bronze from the two pillars, the Sea and the movable stands, which Solomon had made for the temple of the Lord, was more than could be weighed.
korean_text: 또 솔로몬이 여호와의 성전을 위하여 만든 두 기둥과 한 바다와 받침들을 가져갔는데 이 모든 기구의 놋 무게를 헤아릴 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: The bronze from the two pillars
the Sea and the movable stands
for the temple of the Lord
was more than could be weighed
sentences.korean_translation: 무게를 잴 수 없을 정도로 많았다
